com.wordpress.loeper.kvv.base

Class ServiceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wordpress.loeper.kvv.base.ServiceHandler

  • public class ServiceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles session management and network operations for the Base API. Thus it has to parse a lot of plain HTML into object Models.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Martin Löper

    • Nested Class Summary

      The search operations which can be requested from the KVV server.

      The language in which the KVV server should respond.
      static class  ServiceHandler.TravelChangeSpeed
      The amount of time a user needs afoot.
      static class  ServiceHandler.TravelType
      The travel types for a TripRequest.

      • autocomplete

        @Nonnull
public Locations autocomplete(java.lang.String pName)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Returns Locations with a similar name compared to the given String.
        This method provides similar functionality to the Live API method #searchStopByName(String). #searchStopByName(String) as part of the Live endpoint is marginal faster than this method and returns a different container: Stops.
        Parameters:
        pName - the searchphrase for the Location's name attribute
        Returns:
        an object (Locations) acting as container for Location objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs which is caused by networking issues

      • searchStopsByName

        @Nonnull
public Locations searchStopsByName(java.lang.String pName)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Alias for autocomplete(String).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        autocomplete(String)

      • getTrips

        @Nonnull
public Trips getTrips(TripRequest pTripRequest)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                AmbiguousTargetException
        Search for routes between two locations. Parses the plain HTML code from KVV server. Has big potential to fail someday when KVV changes some HTML IDs or output style.
        Parameters:
        pTripRequest - the request containing information about time, location, etc.
        Returns:
        an object (Trips) acting as container for Trip objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs which is caused by networking issues
        AmbiguousTargetException - thrown if route could not be determined
